com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree.branch

Class Parallel<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree.Task<E>
      • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree.BranchTask<E>
        • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree.branch.Parallel<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - type of the blackboard object that tasks use to read or modify game state

    public class Parallel<E>
extends BranchTask<E>
    A Parallel is a special branch task that starts or resumes all children every single time, parallel task will succeed if all the children succeed, fail if one of the children fail. The typical use case: make the game entity react on event while sleeping or wandering.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree.BranchTask
